attributes.action: ask people about seatbelts on public trasport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
well i am petioning about something that has been bothering me for ages about public trasport.
1) why can people stand in the gangway of a bus or train but not on coaches or planes
2) why does planes and coaches have seatbelts but busses trains and other public trasport does not.
3)more people have injurys on trasport without seats than transport without.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
